Hahah darnit..I was gunna use this joke but you beat me. =)

-----Original Message-----
From: jbuckingham@...
[mailto:jbuckingham@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 4:29 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Clarification

From: jbuckingham@...

A Gem _cutter_ is a device made with the tinkering skill
A _gemchopper_ is a gnome warrior

On behalf of gnome warriors everywhere, please use the
correct term,
because no-one is shoving me in a toolbox with a pearl to
see what happens.
